Saudi Arabia scraps execution for those who committed crimes as minors tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735681 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735681/saudi-arabia-scraps-execution-for-those-who-committed-crimes-as-minors/story/ Saudi Arabia will no longer impose the death sentence on individuals who committed crimes while still minors, the state-backed Human Rights Commission (HRC) said in a statement, citing a royal decree by King Salman.
